messages.content: I am fearful of the damage that would be done to the NHS by an all-powerful Conservative government. At this election, the future of our NHS is in your hands.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party to set out a clear plan to fund the NHS. A plan on income tax for the NHS will ease the pressure on NHS staff and patients until long-term solutions can be found.

issues.health: One of our proudest institutions is being damaged by a desperate quest for privatisation by Theresa Mayâ€™s Conservatives.

leaflet.personalStatement: The NHS has been my life. I started work as a doctor in 1982. For nearly 35 years, I`ve proudly served our NHS.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of the Royal College of General Practitioners

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - As an NHS doctor, I am fearful of the damage that would be done to the NHS by an all-powerful Conservative government. At this election, the future of our NHS is in your hands.
